options.name: Beginner Transmuter
options.description: You can research Beginner Level Transmutation Spells and gain +1 Power.

options.name: Empowered Conduit
options.description: In response to taking Elemental Damage, your Conduit automatically attunes to that type of Damage, granting you Mitigation of that Type until you take Damage of a different Elemental Type.

options.name: Free Action : Empowered Charge
options.description: You convert the elemental energy stored in your Conduit to raw energy, Charging your next Spell that you complete Channeling on this turn. Your Empowered Conduit loses its charge and must be empowered again before using this ability.

options.name: Immutable Crafting
options.description: Items you Craft are Immutable without needing to add an Infusion

options.name: Novice Transmuter
options.description: You can research Novice Level Transmutation Spells, gain +1 Spell Attack and +2 Power.

options.name: Psychokinesis
options.description: You gain the innate ability to use the Charged version of the Telekinesis Spell as an Action instead of a Spell. Instead of a Spell Attack, you make a Concentration Check for the Attack Roll and use your Concentration Modifier as the Damage Bonus Modifier.

options.name: Action : Unleashed Element
options.description: You unleash the energy in your Empowered Conduit and make a Ray Spell Attack against a target within 15 units with a +2 Spell Attack Bonus dealing Damage of the type stored in your Conduit equal to 3d10 + [Level]. On a True Hit, this ability becomes a Line Attack instead. Your Empowered Conduit loses its charge and must be empowered again before using this ability.

options.name: Journeyman Transmuter
options.description: You can research Journeyman Level Transmutation Spells, gain +5 Power and +1 Elemental Mitigation

options.name: Free Action : Spell Force
options.description: After hitting a Large or smaller Creature with a Spell, you displace them by up to 1 Unit.

options.name: Reaction : Convert Elements
options.description: When a Creature within 20 Units of you takes Elemental Damage, convert it to another type of Elemental Damage.

options.name: Expert Transmuter
options.description: You can research Expert Level Transmutation Spells, gain +8 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage

options.name: Free Action : Empowered Telekinesis
options.description: Change the Damage Type of a Spell to either Lightning, Fire or Cold Damage.

options.name: Selectively Immutable
options.description: Your form is Immutable from effects caused by Creatures other than you

options.name: Master Transmuter
options.description: You can research Master Level Transmutation Spells, gain +10 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Resistance. Additionally, you can research or learn Grand Master Transmutation Spells at level 13.
